content:
Of these, 85% are obese or overweight, which leaves about 15% of Type 2 diabetics to be of normal weight.

Other factors that put you at risk of developing Type 2 diabetes include your diet, how physically active you are, smoking and your family history.

Of these, 85% are obese or overweight, which leaves about 15% of Type 2 diabetics to be of normal weight.

title: About 90% of people with diabetes suffer from Type 2 diabetes.
